=================================================
### W0127-23P007B - Sand and Salt Mixture Supply Tender

#### Solicitation Information

*   **Reference Number**: WS4207807211-Doc4256509920
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4207807211
*   **Publication Date**: October 12, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time**: October 27, 2023, 14:00 EDT

#### Procurement Details

*   **UNSPSC Code**: 11111700 - Sand
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Contract Details

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 5, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: October 1, 2026

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

#### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
*   **Name and Contact Information**: Melanie Perrin - melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice and Tender Description

Please be advised that this solicitation is a Request for Standing Offer for the supply of Sand and Salt mixtures for the Department of National Defence. The tender closing date and time is October 27, 2023, 14:00 EDT. All
